name: Tappy Tap - Infinite Rolling Football Kids Games
name_original: Tappy Tap - Infinite Rolling Football Kids Games
description:
Tappy Tap is challenging and interesting arcade game where the barriers and traps makes it more addictive.

Tappy Tap is created for mind teasing game lovers, slide your soccer ball to get it started in the sky, trust your reflexes and make speedy turns on the bounce to land on the accurate football field. If you miss to hit your ball in the right direction, the ball will fly in the sky leaving you with the Retry option :)

Features:
- One touch control and simple orientation
- Automatic bounce in the sky
- Sky rolling football field theme
- Challenging your speed and reflexes
